original_text: The soldiers did what their leader had told them to do. They took Paul out from the prison in their building. That night, they took him as far as Antipatris.
korean_text: 보병이 명을 받은 대로 밤에 바울을 데리고 안디바드리에 이르러

sentences.original_text: The soldiers did what their leader had told them to do
sentences.korean_translation: 군인들은 그들의 지도자가 시킨 대로 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They took Paul out from the prison
they took him as far as Antipatris
